If all mirrors vanished, you could still see your reflection by looking at your own eyes. Reflections can be seen in the cornea of the eye, which acts like a small mirror.
You could use a smartphone or camera to take a picture of yourself and then use photo editing software to remove the background and focus on your face to see your reflection.
You could ask a friend or family member to hold up a piece of paper or a mirror to reflect your image.
You could use a handheld mirror or a compact mirror to see your reflection.
You could go to a location where there is a natural body of water, such as a pond or lake, and look at the reflection of your face in the water to see your reflection.
